course.title: Psychological Treatment Research
course.description: Review theories of behavior change, methods of studying such change (single-case research designs, randomized clinical trials, etc.), and current evidence-based approaches to assessing and treating psychopathology. Examines historical, ethical, and cultural issues.
course.prerequisites: SLS-20 or its predecessors and Psychology 18.
course.notes: Open to undergraduates with permission of instructor.
